amendment.description: Amendment makes technical and clarifying revisions to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 114-790 to make technical and clarifying revisions to H.R. 5303. Includes additional Chief's Reports and Post Authorization Change Reports submitted by the Army Corps of Engineers since May 25, 2016.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Shuster.
